Uses of Package
edu.sjsu.cs.ghost151

  • Classes in edu.sjsu.cs.ghost151 used by edu.sjsu.cs.ghost151 
    Class and Description
    Board
    The Board class represents the environment for the simulation.
    BoardDirection
    The BoardDirection class stores a pair of row/column offsets that indicate an ordinal direction on the Board grid.
    BoardObject
    A BoardObject is the basic unit stored within the Board.
    BoardObjectType
    BoardObjectType is an enumeration of the potential kinds of objects that may be stored on a Board grid.
    BoardPosition
    BoardPosition is a simple utility class storing row/column coordinates on the Board.
    BoardRenderer
    A BoardRenderer implementation is responsible for creating a String representation of the Board suitable for printing to stdout.
    Game
    The Game class contains the core logic for our simulation.
    Ghost
    The Ghost is a specialized BoardObject that has the ability to look at its surroundings, communicate with other ghosts, and move around the board.
    GhostMovementAlgorithm
    A GhostMovementAlgorithm uses a Ghost's explored positions and other information a Ghost has to determine the next position on the map the Ghost should move towards.
    GhostMovementAlgorithmType
    The GhostMovementAlgorithmType is an enumeration factory for creating appropriate instances of the GhostMovementAlgorithm interface.
